Dozen Red Roses.description: 12 premium red roses (Rosa rubiginosa) with long stems, beautifully arranged in a crystal glass vase with baby's breath and greenery

Tulip Bouquet.description: 8 vibrant Dutch tulips (Tulipa gesneriana) in mixed colors - red, yellow, and pink - arranged in a ceramic garden vase with decorative ribbon

Lily Arrangement.description: 6 elegant white Asiatic lilies (Lilium asiaticum) with eucalyptus leaves and fern, presented in an elegant tall vase

Sunflower Bundle.description: 5 large sunflowers (Helianthus annuus) with natural stems, wrapped in brown kraft paper with twine - perfect for rustic arrangements

Mixed Spring Flowers.description: Seasonal spring bouquet featuring daffodils, tulips, hyacinths, and cherry blossom branches in a ceramic garden vase with moss accent

Crystal Glass Vase.description: Hand-blown crystal glass vase, 12 inches tall with diamond-cut pattern, perfect for long-stemmed flowers

Ceramic Garden Vase.description: Handcrafted ceramic vase with earth-tone glaze, 8 inches tall, ideal for medium-sized bouquets

Elegant Tall Vase.description: Premium frosted glass vase, 16 inches tall with silver rim detail, designed for dramatic tall flower arrangements

Premium Chocolate Box.description: 24-piece assorted Belgian chocolates including dark chocolate truffles, milk chocolate pralines, and white chocolate ganache

Heart-Shaped Chocolates.description: 16 heart-shaped milk and dark chocolates with raspberry, caramel, and hazelnut fillings in a red velvet box

Handwritten Message Card.description: Personalized handwritten message on premium cardstock with calligraphy pen, includes matching envelope

Luxury Greeting Card.description: Embossed greeting card with gold foil accents, blank inside for personal message, includes luxury envelope with wax seal

Romance Combo.description: Complete romantic package: dozen red roses in crystal vase, 24-piece Belgian chocolate box, luxury greeting card, and scented candle

Spring Special.description: Spring celebration set: mixed spring flower bouquet in ceramic vase, heart-shaped chocolates, and handwritten message card

Garden Delight.description: Garden-themed bundle: lily arrangement in elegant tall vase, premium chocolate box, and luxury greeting card with botanical design

Sweet Surprise.description: Sweet treat combination: tulip bouquet in ceramic vase, heart-shaped chocolates, and handwritten message card

Ultimate Birthday Gift Set.description: Deluxe birthday package: dozen red roses in crystal vase, mixed spring flowers, 24-piece Belgian chocolates, luxury greeting card, and decorative gift wrapping
